Package Model

Interface PlayerADT

All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface PlayerADT
The interface of a Player with the declaration of the methods that set, get and modify the attributes of the Player
Author:
delis

  • Method Details

    • setWinStatus

      void setWinStatus​(boolean won)
      transformer: sets the win status of the player postcondition: the win status of the player has changed
      Parameters:
      won - true for win false for haven't yet won

    • hasWon

      boolean hasWon()
      observer:Returns the win status of the player Postcondition: returns the win status of the player
      Returns:
      true for win false for haven't yet won

    • setTurnStatus

      void setTurnStatus​(boolean myTurn)
      transformer: sets the turn status of the player postcondition: the turn status of the player has changed
      Parameters:
      myTurn - true for my turn false for not my turn

    • isMyTurn

      boolean isMyTurn()
      observer:Returns the turn status of the player Postcondition: returns the turn status of the player
      Returns:
      true for player's turn false for not player's turn

    • getName

      accessor:Returns the name of the player Postcondition: returns the name of the player

    • setMoveStatus

      void setMoveStatus​(boolean moved)
      transformer: sets the move status of the player postcondition: the win status of the player has changed
      Parameters:
      moved - true if player has moved in this turn, else false

    • hasMoved

      boolean hasMoved()
      observer:Returns the moved status of the player Postcondition: returns the moved status of the player
      Returns:
      true if player has moved in this turn, else false

    • setOngoingAction

      void setOngoingAction​(boolean ongoingAction)
      transformer: sets the ongoingAction status of the player postcondition: the ongoingAction status of the player has changed
      Parameters:
      ongoingAction - true if player has an ongoing action (eg he has to draw a card but hasn't done so yet) , else false

    • ongoingAction

      boolean ongoingAction()
      observer:Returns the ongoingAction status of the player Postcondition: the ongoingAction status of the player has been returned
      Returns:
      true if player has an ongoing action (eg he has to draw a card but hasn't done so yet) , else false

    • setCurrentTile

      void setCurrentTile​(Tile tile)
      transformer: moves the player to a new tile
      precondition: the tile is not null
      postcondition: the currentTile of the player has changed the tile of the parameter
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile the player will move to
